metadata.Plot: After drag racing his vintage convertible around Palm Springs, a retired NASA test pilot loses his license. Forced to take public transportation, he meets Caroline and learns to navigate love and life again.
metadata.Actors: William Shatner, Jean Smart, Don McManus
